title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email and password, receiving a secure JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid email address and strong password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration is successful and JWT token is received.
Confirm user is redirected to the user dashboard.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify registration fails when the email format is invalid and an appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input an invalid email format and valid password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the registration is rejected and validation error message is shown.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify an existing user can successfully login with valid email and password and receive JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered email and correct password.
Submit the login form.
Verify login is successful and JWT token is issued.
Confirm user navigates to personalized dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login attempt with a valid email but incorrect password is rejected with an appropriate error.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid email and incorrect password.
Submit the login form.
Verify login is rejected with correct error message.

title: User Logout and Session Termination
description: Verify that a logged-in user can successfully logout and that the session and JWT token are invalidated.

steps.description: Log in with valid user credentials.
Click on the logout button.
Confirm user is logged out and redirected to login or home page.
Verify that the JWT token is invalidated and further API access is denied.

title: Match Creation with Valid Inputs
description: Verify an authenticated user can create a cricket match with valid team names, players, and overs configuration.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user and navigate to match creation page on dashboard.
Input valid team names, add valid players for each team.
Set overs configuration within allowed range.
Submit the match creation form.
Verify match is successfully created and match details are saved.
Confirm match appears in user dashboard recent matches or matches list.

title: Match Creation with Missing Player Data
description: Verify match creation fails if the required players are not added for teams, and appropriate validation errors are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to match creation page as logged-in user.
Add team names but omit players for one or both teams.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify validation error is shown indicating players are required.

title: Start Match with Toss and Player Selection
description: Verify match initialization workflow including toss decision, opening batsmen, and bowler selection is functional and input validated.

steps.description: Open a created match ready for start.
Perform toss selection choosing batting or bowling.
Select opening striker, non-striker, and opening bowler from team players.
Confirm and start the match.
Verify match status changes to started and live scoring interface is enabled.

title: Live Scoring Ball-by-Ball Valid Event
description: Verify scorer can record a valid ball event with runs, extras, or wickets and the score updates accurately in real-time to all viewers.

steps.description: Navigate to the live scoring page of a started match.
Select current striker, non-striker, and bowler.
Record a legal delivery with runs scored (including boundary, singles, or extras).
Verify the ball is accepted and scorecard updates in the UI.
Confirm all connected viewers receive the real-time update within 500ms.

title: Live Scoring with Invalid Ball Event (Illegal Delivery)
description: Verify that recording an invalid ball event such as an illegal delivery or incorrect over progression is rejected with appropriate error.

steps.description: Navigate to live scoring interface during a live match.
Try to record an invalid delivery like a ball count exceeding 6 in over or invalid runs value.
Submit the ball event.
Verify the ball event is rejected and error notification is shown to scorer.

title: Scorecard Display Accuracy
description: Verify that the scorecard page correctly displays detailed innings statistics, ball-by-ball history, team totals, and player performances with accurate aggregation.

steps.description: Open the scorecard page of a completed or live match.
Verify innings totals, overs, runs, wickets are correctly displayed.
Verify ball-by-ball history matches the recorded ball events.
Verify individual player stats such as runs scored, wickets taken are accurate.

title: Leaderboard Aggregation and Ranking Accuracy
description: Verify that team and player leaderboards aggregate statistics correctly across multiple matches and rank participants as per defined metrics.

steps.description: Access the leaderboard page.
Verify that team rankings are based on aggregated match wins, runs, or points.
Verify player leaderboards correctly show aggregated runs, wickets, or averages.
Confirm sorting and pagination work as expected.

title: Unauthorized Match Modification Attempt
description: Verify that a user who is not authorized to modify a match cannot perform update or scoring actions on that match.

steps.description: Log in as a user not associated with a specific match.
Attempt to access APIs or UI to update or score the match.
Verify API returns 403 Forbidden or equivalent error.
Verify UI disables editing or scoring controls and displays access denied message.

title: Real-time Updates Delivery under Load
description: Verify that real-time broadcast of scoring events via Pusher maintains latency below 500ms when multiple viewers are connected.

steps.description: Start a live match and connect multiple viewer clients to receive updates.
Record multiple ball events in quick succession as scorer.
Verify all clients receive updates in less than 500ms consistently.
Confirm no update events are dropped and client states remain consistent.

title: API Error Handling and Status Codes
description: Verify that all API endpoints handle invalid inputs, unauthorized access, and server errors gracefully with correct HTTP codes and messages.

steps.description: Send malformed or invalid data to auth, matches, and leaderboard APIs.
Verify APIs return proper 4xx error codes with descriptive error messages.
Attempt API calls with expired or missing JWT tokens.
Confirm 401 Unauthorized responses.
Simulate server errors and verify 5xx responses with error logging.

title: UI Toast Notifications for Success and Failure
description: Verify that UI displays accessible and clear toast notifications on success and failure events such as login, scoring updates and errors.

steps.description: Trigger typical success events: registration completion, match creation, scoring update.
Verify success toast is displayed with correct messaging and disappears after timeout.
Trigger failure events: invalid login, scoring error, network failure.
Verify error toast appears with appropriate message and accessibility attributes.

title: Database Model Validation and Integrity
description: Verify MongoDB models enforce schema validation rules and reject invalid documents for users and matches.

steps.description: Attempt to insert or update user documents with invalid email or missing required fields.
Verify database rejects operation with validation error.
Attempt to insert match documents with invalid overs or missing players.
Confirm match schema validation triggers errors on invalid data.

title: JWT Secret Rotation and Token Expiry Handling
description: Verify that JWT tokens are correctly invalidated upon secret rotation and expired tokens are denied access consistently.

steps.description: Authenticate and receive a JWT token.
Rotate JWT secret on server.
Verify previously issued tokens become invalid and access is denied.
Try to use expired JWT token to access protected APIs.
Confirm 401 Unauthorized responses.

title: User Dashboard Displays Personalized Match Overview
description: Verify logged-in user's dashboard displays recent matches, quick actions, and user statistics accurately tailored to their matches.

steps.description: Log in as a user with multiple past and ongoing matches.
Verify recent matches are listed with correct status and details.
Confirm quick action buttons for match creation and scoring are functional.
Verify user statistics like matches played and runs scored are accurate.

title: Home and Landing Pages Render Correctly and Include Live Matches
description: Verify that marketing landing pages render feature showcases and live matches component, and links to authentication flow work.

steps.description: Navigate to the home and landing pages.
Verify top hero sections and feature grids are visible and correctly styled.
Confirm live match displays update as matches become live.
Click call-to-action link to register or login.
Verify navigation occurs to auth pages.

title: Server Health Endpoint Availability
description: Verify that the API health check endpoint returns server status and diagnostics accurately.

steps.description: Send GET request to the health check endpoint.
Verify HTTP 200 response with expected diagnostic payload.

title: Rate Limiting on Authentication Endpoints
description: Verify that the authentication API endpoints enforce rate limiting to prevent brute-force attempts.

steps.description: Send multiple rapid login requests with incorrect credentials to login API.
Confirm that after threshold is exceeded, requests are blocked with 429 Too Many Requests code.

title: Input Sanitization Prevents Injection Attacks
description: Verify that user inputs for registration, match creation, and scoring are sanitized preventing XSS and injection vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Attempt to submit scripts or SQL-like injection strings in form fields.
Verify inputs are sanitized and stored data does not contain malicious code.
Confirm no client or server errors occur due to such inputs.

title: Scorecard and Leaderboard Data Consistency After Match Finalization
description: Verify that once a match is finalized, scorecard and leaderboards update accurately reflecting final stats and results.

steps.description: Finish a live match and trigger match finalization.
Verify the finalized scorecard reflects total scores, wickets, and player stats.
Verify leaderboards are updated accordingly on next user access.

title: UI Component Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify all UI components including forms, toasts, buttons and dialogs are accessible and operable via keyboard navigation.

steps.description: Navigate through the main app using keyboard only.
Verify focus states are visible and components respond properly to keyboard inputs.
Confirm ARIA roles and labels are present on UI elements for screen readers.
